title: The Deepening Reach
description: The Dwarven tunnels honeycomb the earth, giving them access to not only the ore they covet, but to the land above that provides them food and sustenance. But there’s one tunnel, long forgotten, that’s been rediscovered: The Deepening Reach.It now holds the key to winning the war against the hated goblins for possession of the holy mountain, but there’s a reason why the tunnel was sealed generations ago, and the Dwarven soldiers sent to exploit it have to learn why, or risk having the goblins use it against them.But when Quinton, a young fugitive from Star Gleam City fleeing a bounty hunter, crosses paths with the soldiers, their fates become intertwined in ways that neither side can fully understand.As the hunter closes in, Quinton and his companions race against time to solve the secret of the Deepening Reach before it’s too late for all of them.About 96,000 words.
author: Todd Shryock
